attributes.action: continue with the planned road pricing policy but ONLY if there is substantial and NEW investment into public transport and greener transport initiatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A recent petition to abolish the planned road pricing schemes had (by 14th Feb) over 1.4 million signatures which is a considerable number of people and one which cannot be ignored by the government.

However I believe that there are an equal, if not many more, number of people who would be prepared to have road pricing if there were cheap, efficient and green public transport alternatives to cars.

Any road pricing scheme has to be in conjunction with new and substantial investment into public transport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
